Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:рыбак.html>Рыбако́в</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:тяжелый.html>Тяжёлый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:песок.html>песок</a>», <span class="example-date">1977</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="старинное значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:старина.html>старин</a>.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="региональное">рег.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> калика |  странник-слепец, <a href = vnd.unilang:поющий.html>пою́щий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:духовный.html>духо́вные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стихи.html>стихи</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́к</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:много.html>мно́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:странствовавший.html>стра́нствовавший</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:побывавший.html>побыва́вший</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:святой.html>святы́х</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>места́х</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Г</a>. ***каленый.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:каленый.html>калёный</a> (20498)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:каленый.html>калёный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">kaljónyj</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:red-hot.html>red-hot</a>, tempered (<a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:iron.html>iron</a>), <a href = vnd.unilang:make.html>made</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> tempered <a href = vnd.unilang:steel.html>steel</a>
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1899</b>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>A</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>V</a>. Zheleznova,  “<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oy,_to_ne_vecher" class="extiw" title="w:Oy, to ne vecher"><a href = vnd.unilang:сон.html>Сон</a> Стеньки Разина</a>”, <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a>  <cite><a href = vnd.unilang:song.html>Songs</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> Ural Cossacks</cite>, 19th-century <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:folk.html>folk</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:song.html>song</a>:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Cyrl e-quotation" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ой.html>Ой́</a>, разы́пались <b>калёныя</b> стрѣ́лы / какъ <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> ма́тушкѣ <a href = vnd.unilang:сырой.html>сыро́й</a> землѣ́."</span><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Oj, razýpalisʹ <b>kaljónyja</b> strě́ly / kak <a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> mátuškě syrój zemlě́."</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:ah.html>Ah</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <b>tempered</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:arrow.html>arrows</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>were</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:scatter.html>scattered</a> / <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:damp.html>damp</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mother.html>mother</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:earth.html>earth</a>.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:roast.html>roasted</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:каленый.html>калёные</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:орех.html>оре́хи</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>kaljónyje</b> oréxi</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:roast.html>roasted</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:nut.html>nuts</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">кали́льный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kalílʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">кали́ть</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ка<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лё<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>калёнее, калёней.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-кал-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ён</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***калечивший.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:калечить.html>кале́чивший</a> (19047)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:калечить.html>кале́чивший</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">kaléčivšij</span>)
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кали.html>ка́ли</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">káli</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:indeclinable.html>indeclinable</a></i>)

<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:obsolete.html>obsolete</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:potash.html>potash</a></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes"><a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>Usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>notes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h5>

<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:кали.html>кали́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">kalí</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">second-person <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:imperative.html>imperative</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">кали́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">kalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ка́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, несклоняемое (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 0  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-кали-</b>.

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="историческое">истор.</span> гидроксид <a href = vnd.unilang:калий.html>ка́лия</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a |   <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> мн. ч. предположительны <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неупотребимы.

***калитка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:калитка.html>кали́тка</a> (3588)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:per.html>Per</a> Vasmer, <a href = vnd.unilang:most.html>most</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:likely.html>likely</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/akanye" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:akanye">akanye</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:where.html>where</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">*<a href = vnd.unilang:колит.html>коли́та</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">*kolita</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:come.html>comes</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Cyrl <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:калифорнийский.html>калифорни́йский</a> (16075)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:калифорний.html>калифо́рния</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">Kalifórnija</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-и́йский</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-íjskij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li>Californian</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ка<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:фора.html>фо́р</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ни́й<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ский</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3a✕~.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-калифорн-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ий-ск</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

***калмык.html
